definition[0]: caused by or connected with something you have already mentioned
example[0]: The war and the corresponding fall in trade have had a devastating effect on the country.
definition[1]: having similar qualities or a similar size, position etc to something else
example[1]: Sales are up 10% on the corresponding period last year.
definition[2]: similar to the one you have just mentioned
example[2]: Profits for June showed an increase of 1.5% compared to the corresponding period last year.
definition[3]: resulting from or connected with what you have just mentioned
example[3]: As a result of the falling birthrate, there was also a corresponding decline in the total number of the workforce.
